snippet.title: Latin America Empire 2027 Trailer
snippet.description:
Latin America Empire 2027 game is a free political and strategy turn based game designed in single player mode.

The year is 2027 and a big uprising took the existing government in your country. 
As the leader of the rebels you got unlimited authority in the country. 
The parliament got your nomination and you way to bring the country to be empire in the Latin America.
As new leader, your goal is to ultimately become supreme to all others.
Using everything from diplomacy to war, you must strive to build an empire, both economically and militarily, superior to all others.
Are you ready to lead supreme commander...? 

In the game you select country you wish to lead and start to play.
The game contain: World weapons suppliers, Spy Center, War Room, Diplomacy, Economy, Technologies, World News (Economy, Relations, Spy and War) and very smart AI...
Weapons in the game: Mercenaries, Armoured personnel carrier (APC's), Tanks, Artillery, Anti-Air Missiles, Helicopters, Fighther Jets, Ships, Submarines, Fighting Robots, Unmanned Aerial Vehicles (UAV's), Aircraft Carriers

The system design to think on thousands of possible scenarios and to choose the best way to win.
In the end of every game the system will show your score and what the AI think on your leadership skills.
The game have real data and based on World Factbook.
Good luck new born leader :)

Our Games: https://www.igindis.com
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/igindis

Social channels
Discord server: https://discord.gg/Hhnz6Zc
Facebook: https://bit.ly/33KU05e
Instagram: https://bit.ly/3hTU9sc
Twitter: https://bit.ly/35VU6tl
Youtube: https://bit.ly/35XLAu5

#iGindisGames #StrategyGames #TurnBasedGames #EmpireBuildingGames #TurnBasedMultiplayerGame #TurnBasedStrategy #MMOStrategy #LeadershipSkills #WorldLeaders #NewBornCountry #StrategyMultiplayerGames #Empire2027
